page.title: 12Playground Games.
page.content: There are lots of games children play on the school playground. They include the following: Skipping. Polo. Hopscotch. Budge. Netball. May-I. Chain-Tig. Blockie. Stuck in Poison. the mud. Eye-ball Snatchers. Chase. Chinese Whispers. The most popular ones are{Skipping and{Chain-Tig.}In the latter there is someone "on" and when they tig you,you have to hold their hand.This forms a chain.The game ends when everyone has joined the chain. {"Blockie" In this you have a "blockie" post and someone is "on".The others have to hide and when the person who is "on" sees you he says "blockie"1,2,3,and the person is caught.But they can say
